players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Alice was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "I think Charlie is the mafia. He was too quiet and didn't say anything about the kill. He also didn't mention any other suspects."
Charlie: "I was the detective. I investigated Diana and found she is mafia. Alice was killed. So we should vote her."
Diana: "I think Bob is the mafia. He was too quiet and didn't mention any suspects."
Charlie: "Bob, you were silent. I investigated Diana and found she's mafia. Vote her."
You: "Charlie, your investigation of Diana is correct. Alice was killed by the mafia, so we should vote Diana."
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
Charlie was arrested

players.name: Charlie
memory: You're Charlie, the detective.
Night 1 begins.

You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Diana knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.

You: "I was the detective. I investigated Diana and found she is mafia. Alice was killed. So we should vote her."
Diana: "I think Bob is the mafia. He was too quiet and didn't mention any suspects."
You: "Bob, you were silent. I investigated Diana and found she's mafia. Vote her."
Bob: "Charlie, your investigation of Diana is correct. Alice was killed by the mafia, so we should vote Diana."
